body:
Comment 2: 
I agree with rsc. I wouldn't even call it unfortunate but simply working as intended.

We've been trying pretty hard to define what values are constants - and have constant
expressions truly evaluate at compile-time - and what values are not constants. If a
compiler had to raise a compile-time error for such maps, we'd open the door for all
kinds of complications. I'd rather not do that.

Leaving for rsc to close.
